sentences.english: He sucks so far in the latest season of American Idol.
sentences.chinese: 最新这季“美国偶像”里他的表现烂透了。

sentences.english: Also Malone is a terrible person.
sentences.chinese: 还有马龙这个人真是烂透了。

sentences.english: These corrupted officials are bad to the bone.
My photographic skills are very poor. I need to learn from my 'elders'.
sentences.chinese: 小女子拍照的技术烂透了，要好好向前辈学习。

sentences.english: And Pauli said this: "That guy's work is crap.
sentences.chinese: 泡利说，“那家伙的研究烂透了。

sentences.english: Your job sucks and for whatever reason you can't leave.
sentences.chinese: 你的工作烂透了但无论如何你都无法离职。

sentences.english: Your dancing is horrible, I hope you break your legs.
sentences.chinese: 你的舞烂透了，真希望你摔断腿。

definition: muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
(dialect) not that great/not up to much/nothing special

pinyin: lan4 ni2 fu2 bu4 shang4 qiang2

definition: see 無可救藥|无可救药[wu2 ke3 jiu4 yao4]
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
lit. no antidote is possible (idiom); incurable/incorrigible/beyond redemption
(Internet slang) (of a situation, video clip etc) to make one think "wtf!"
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
spectacle too horrible to endure (idiom); tragic sight/appalling scenes of devastation
